config.name: xp70
config.command: clCheck 500 make KGCOMPILER=sthormkg FABRIC_TYPE=xp70 -f Threshold.mk WG0=31 WG1=17 SIZE_X=113 SIZE_Y=251 clean run

config.name: xp70
config.command: clCheck 500 make KGCOMPILER=sthormkg FABRIC_TYPE=xp70 -f Threshold2.mk WG0=31 WG1=17 SIZE_X=113 SIZE_Y=251 clean run

config.name: xp70
config.command: clCheck 500 make KGCOMPILER=sthormkg FABRIC_TYPE=xp70 -f ImageConversion.mk WG0=31 WG1=17 SIZE_X=113 SIZE_Y=251 clean run
